Package com.geoloqi.android.sdk

Interface Summary
LQBuild This interface defines build constants for the SDK build version strings.
LQSession.OnRunApiRequestListener Interface definition for a callback to be invoked when LQSession.runApiRequest(org.apache.http.client.methods.HttpRequestBase, com.geoloqi.android.sdk.LQSession.OnRunApiRequestListener) completes.
 

Class Summary
LQSession LQSession represents a client session for communicating directly with the Geoloqi REST API.
LQSharedPreferences This class contains a collection of static methods for reading and writing key/value data required by the Geoloqi SDK.
LQTracker LQTracker is a singleton responsible for queueing location updates and sending them to the server.
 

Enum Summary
LQTracker.LQTrackerProfile The profile used to define the behavior of the location tracker.
LQTracker.LQTrackerStatus Used to indicate the current status of the location tracker, regardless of the active tracking profile.
 

Exception Summary
LQException This is the base Exception class thrown when a recoverable error is encountered while interacting with the Geoloqi SDK.
